statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (14,-15) and (12,5).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{5}-{\left(-{15}\right)}}}{{{12}-{\left({14}\right)}}}=\frac{{20}}{{-{{2}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-{10} (if it's not already reduced)
